data.what_is:
SeoSamba's Marketing Operating System or MOS is a comprehensive cloud marketing software ideal for small businesses and multi-locations enterprises alike.

Your SeoSamba Marketing Operating System includes a set of high-performance tools to help build a powerful no-nonsense digital marketing presence up.

Access SEO tools, Google and Facebook review management tools, email marketing tools, social marketing tools including a mobile app, VoIP telephony and call tracking tools, text marketing and messaging tools, as well as centralized blogging for SeoToaster and Wordpress powered websites.
SeoSamba MOS seamlessly integrates with SeoSamba's CRM product SeoToaster Ultimate CRM and features two companions mobile apps, a social marketing and lead & CRM apps to help you manage your business on-the-go.
data.product_description: SeoSamba is a multi-site marketing automation software platform.
data.supported_languages: German, English, French, Dutch, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish

pricing_plans.plan_description:
SeoSamba's Marketing Operating System or MOS is a comprehensive cloud marketing software ideal for small businesses and multi-locations enterprises alike.

Your SeoSamba Marketing Operating System includes a set of high-performance tools to help build a powerful no-nonsense digital marketing presence up.

Access SEO tools, Google and Facebook review management tools, email marketing tools, social marketing tools including a mobile app, VoIP telephony and call tracking tools, text marketing and messaging tools, as well as centralized blogging for SeoToaster and Wordpress powered websites.
SeoSamba MOS seamlessly integrates with SeoSamba's CRM product SeoToaster Ultimate CRM and features two companions mobile apps, a social marketing and lead & CRM apps to help you manage your business on-the-go.

SeoSamba MOS can be private-labeled by solution providers.
plan_features: Centralized social marketing curation to locate great shareable content
Centralized social calendar with daily/weekly/monthly view
Unlimited social network profiles and accounts
Post to LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and Google My Business
Social Mobile App with on-the-fly collage and access to centralized social calendar
Centralized Review management system for Google and Facebook (100+ review site on metered access)
Centralized Email newsletter marketing (metered) with automated blog digest newsletter creation
Search Rankings reporting with our unique Return On SEO Investment calculator
Web analytics with automated correlation to blog, PR, email, social activity..
1 click access  and distribution to Press Release distribution channels (metered)
Key Performance Indicators reporting including Google Ads and Facebook Ads account reporting
1 click access  and distribution to Press Release distribution channels (metered)
Telephony and text messaging (metered), including call-tracking, voicemail, music on hold, click-to-call, inbound/outbound texting and integration with SeoToaster Ultimate CRM
Search Engine Optimization on-site execution for SeoToaster and/or WordPress website
Centralized blog system for any number of SeoToaster and/or WordPress website
Centralized content and application distribution to connected SeoToaster and/or WordPress website

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SeoSamba Marketing Operating System?
Payroll Vault has worked with SeoSamba for about 5 years, and it has been a very beneficial relationship! Their team is responsive, will offer best practices and insights when needed, and is always available to help us increase our brand presence and new projects. Their admin and toaster platforms REALLY make our marketing efficient and customizable at every level. We look forward to our continued partnership and successes together.

What do you dislike about SeoSamba Marketing Operating System?
Sometimes (not often) the social posting platform can lag. Outside of that, everything works just fine.

Recommendations to others considering SeoSamba Marketing Operating System:
If you are searching for a comprehensive platform that will meet your social, email, lead management, reputation management, and website needs, SeoSamba is an excellent choice.

What problems is SeoSamba Marketing Operating System solving and how is that benefiting you?
The platform allows us to manage and oversee the brand and help keep our finger on the pulse of our reputation at every level.
